name: Json Parser
description: Tired of opening the browser for formatting and validating JSON? Why don't you install JSON Parser and do it inside IDE with offline support? JSON Parser is a lightweight plugin for validating and formatting JSON strings. Install and spread the word :)
notes:
Version 1.0

Parse VALID JSON string only.

Version 1.1

Support for all platforms.

Version 1.2

Added 3 options
  • Pretty print
  • Raw
  • Tree

Version 1.2.1

1. Error message if not a valid json 2. Bug fixes

Version 1.3

  • Bug fixes

Version 1.4

  • Tabs added
  • Menu item added under Edit menu (ctrl shift alt J)
  • Rate/ donate notification issue fixed

Version 1.4.2

  • Ui Bug fix
